contents.text: Dig deeper into the subject of this week’s cartoon:

Israel’s proposed legal reforms are a dreadful answer to a real problem (Feb 2023)The overhaul of Israel’s judiciary will maim its democracy, says Polly Bronstein (Feb 2023)Binyamin Netanyahu rushes to take on Israel’s Supreme Court (Jan 2023)
KAL’s cartoon appears weekly in The Economist. You can see last week’s here.
